channel.title: Moparscape keeps closing, HELP!
channel.description: When I downloaded Moparscape and made my own server, I edited my account details in the HybridScape folder, now, when I tried to get on the window kept closing, when I went on the Moparscape webclient, www.moparisthebest.com, the internet closed down. So I used the DNS and it came up with a error saying: java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\main_file_cache.dat (Access is denied) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:52) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows\.mpr_file_store_32\cache.zip (Access i s denied) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:126) at Update.<init>(Update.java:34) at client.method67(client.java:3128) at client.method6(client.java:6228) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43) at client.run(client.java:4081) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) You lost connection while downloading a needed file. Please download it manually from: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/ folder. Then restart MoparScape. Fatal error, exiting. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Moparscape keeps closing, HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Doomscape Doomscape
item.description:
@Doomscape wrote:

When I downloaded Moparscape and made my own server, I edited my account details in the HybridScape folder, now, when I tried to get on the window kept closing, when I went on the Moparscape webclient, www.moparisthebest.com, the internet closed down. So I used the DNS and it came up with a error saying:
java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows.mpr_file_store_32\main_file_cache.dat
(Access is denied)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source)
at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:52)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
java.io.FileNotFoundException: c:\windows.mpr_file_store_32\cache.zip (Access i
s denied)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileOutputStream.(Unknown Source)
at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:126)
at Update.(Update.java:34)
at client.method67(client.java:3128)
at client.method6(client.java:6228)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:43)
at client.run(client.java:4081)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
You lost connection while downloading a needed file.
Please download it manually from:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip
and extract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/
folder. Then restart MoparScape.
Fatal error, exiting.
Press any key to continue . . .
